column2: "I'm not an ARKS member myself. But I hope that after I study some more I will be able to become one and be useful to everyone!"

"I'm not an ARKS member myself. But I hope that after I study some more I will be able to become one and be useful to everyone!"
"Wow. This practice data is amazing! It's not just doing simple calculations. It's doing all kinds of things...!"

"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. That's my duty as a scholar, what I trained to do."
"Even something as trivial-seeming as weather changes could be useful, for example."

"Even something as trivial as a change in weather patterns could be useful."
"Hey, you're in ARKS, right? Sorry to bother you, but have you got a moment? I have a request for you."
"Even the strangest weather phenomena have a physical explanation. It's a scholar's duty to find out what that is."
"To do that, you need to analyse the data patiently and without prejudice. It can be a pretty fun process."
"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. That's my duty as a scholar, what I trained to do."
"Even something as trivial as a change in weather patterns could be useful."

"Excellent work. You succeeded despite an overwhelming difference in numbers...
It was quite a sight to see."
"It's no secret that it took us all by surprise. Our data didn't predict anything like it. I found it to be a very interesting result."
"I will continue my research. If you have any questions for me, I'll be happy to answer them."
